channel.title: Belle Fourche|Butte County|South Dakota|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Belle Fourche|Butte County|South Dakota|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-85 South at SD-34
item.description: US-85 South at SD-34. Continue south on US-85 for I-90 (at Spearfish).

item.title: US-85 North at SD-34
item.description: US-85 north at SD-34. Use SD-34 west for Heulett, WY; SD-34 east for Whitewood; US-85 north for Belle Fourche.

item.title: US-85 North at SD-34
item.description: US-85 North at SD-34. Continue north on US-85 for US-212 Junction.

item.title: US-85 North Approaching SD-34
item.description: US-85 North approaching SD-34. Mile marker 54 is posted to the bottom of the marker.

item.title: US-85 North - Belle Fourche
item.description: Entering Belle Fourche on US-85 north. Population 4,565. Belle Fourche is the county seat of Butte County, South Dakota.
